title: Combining a daily temperature pattern analysis and a heat-pulse system to estimate sediment depths in sewer systems
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00825H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Manuel Regueiro-Picallo, Jeroen Langeveld, Haoyu Wei, Jean-Luc Bertrand-Krajewski, Jörg Rieckermann
Sediment depth estimations in sewer systems based on the monitoring of temperatures, thermal properties, and the analysis of heat transfer processes. Surrogate model development, laboratory validation and uncertainty analysis.
